name: Robot Wars (Chaotic Good Entertainment)
description:
Robot Wars is a twin stick shooter roguelite game.

You enter a tournament to prove you've got what it takes to become the new champion. You don't look fancy and while your armour looks rather rusty, your skills certainly are not. At least that's what you hope... And if you manage to survive, you can always upgrade yourself with parts from fallen enemies and look the part as well!

Procedurally generated levels in different settings with different enemies. An online high score table that keeps track of your highest score to compete with other aspiring champions.

Balance is probably still somewhat missing, so I'm open to all feedback!
